jobTitle: Experienced Privacy Counsel (Seattle and SF Bay
jobDescription: We are looking for attorneys in/near Seattle and in the San Francisco Bay Area with: Significant privacy experience to support our tech clients.Experience counseling business partners on domestic and international privacy laws, regulations, and industry best practices, drafting and negotiating B2B and B2C contracts and disclosures, including privacy policies, TOS and EULAs.Experience ensuring that privacy matters are incorporated at the design stage into all products and ensuring compliance with privacy policies and procedures.Minimum 7 years of experience as a tech transactions/IP attorney and MUST be a member in good standing with the State Bar of California (RIHC status is not currently accepted).Demonstrated expert knowledge of domestic and international privacy laws & regulations (data privacy, HIPAA, COPPA, and EULA)Experience with ecommerce, and online marketing and advertising laws
